    • Method Detail

      • addMealPlan

        public java.lang.String addMealPlan​(MealPlan mealPlan)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds new MealPlan to the database.
        Parameters:
        mealPlan - the MealPlan to add to the database. Adding it to the DB will assign the id parameter of the MealPlan.
        Returns:
        A string containing the ID of the MealPlan added.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any ingredient or recipe is not in the database

      • deleteMealPlan

        public void deleteMealPlan​(java.lang.String id)
                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Deletes a MealPlan document with the id from the collection of recipes
        Parameters:
        id - The id of MealPlan document we want to delete
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the transaction in the method was not complete

      • editMealPlan

        public void editMealPlan​(MealPlan mealPlan)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Updates the corresponding MealPlan document in the collection with the fields of the MealPlan object.
        Parameters:
        mealPlan - A MealPlan object whose changes we want to push to the collection of MealPlans Note: All of the recipes and ingredients in the MealPlan must be in the DB.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the transaction in the method was not complete
        java.lang.Exception

      • getMealPlan

        public MealPlan getMealPlan​(java.lang.String id)
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Gets a MealPlan from the DB.
        Parameters:
        id - A String with the id of the document who MealPlan we want
        Returns:
        The MealPlan object that corresponds to the document in the collection If it does not exist then return null
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the transaction in the method was not complete

      • getMealPlans

        public java.util.ArrayList<MealPlan> getMealPlans()
                                           throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Makes an ArrayList of MealPlans out of all the documents in the collection of MealPlans
        Returns:
        ArrayList The List of all MealPlans contained in the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the transaction in the method was not complete

      • getDocumentReference

        public com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference getDocumentReference​(java.lang.String id)
        Get the DocumentReference from MealPlans collection for the given id
        Parameters:
        id - The String of the document in MealPlan collection we want
        Returns:
        DocumentReference of the MealPlan
